title: GD, I wish I had a big snuggly bf to cuddle with this Christmas
body:
I am having a lot of feels right now.

I went out and bought gifts and happy couples were everywhere and then there is single me.

I can't get an internship and then plastic surgery with said internship's money fast enough

http://imagesmtv-a.akamaihd.net/uri/mgid:file:http:shared:mtv.com/news/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/vma-crying-9.gif
